name: places/ChIJczdMeTtZwokRP9Td8Qc_NK4
formattedAddress: 12 W 48th St #309, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 W 48th St #309, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: The best haircut of my life! I have wavy and thick hair, and sometimes when I get curly cuts they end up making my hair more straight or they chop off all my hair - which is not what I want. Immediately, Porchia’s experience showed and she knew EXACTLY what to do with my hair to enhance my waves and manage my volume. My waves are POPPING and I can even go without product. She is a magician! Also the steam treatment was amazing. It’s super telling that most of her clients have been with her for years. I will definitely be coming back!

text.text: The best haircut of my life! I have wavy and thick hair, and sometimes when I get curly cuts they end up making my hair more straight or they chop off all my hair - which is not what I want. Immediately, Porchia’s experience showed and she knew EXACTLY what to do with my hair to enhance my waves and manage my volume. My waves are POPPING and I can even go without product. She is a magician! Also the steam treatment was amazing. It’s super telling that most of her clients have been with her for years. I will definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: Had a really great experience today! Porchia is beyond the professional. She took her time and got to know me and my hair. I entered with my hair feeling dry and dull and left with a crown of shiny curls. Don’t just go for beautiful hair but go to meet her. She is is not just talented but a beautiful person!

text.text: Had a really great experience today! Porchia is beyond the professional. She took her time and got to know me and my hair. I entered with my hair feeling dry and dull and left with a crown of shiny curls. Don’t just go for beautiful hair but go to meet her. She is is not just talented but a beautiful person!

originalText.text:
*UPDATE 5/17/2023*
My daughter was way overdue for a haircut. Like always, Porchia works her magic and left my daughter's curls so quenched and defined. She'll educate you on what products can/can't work with your hair. By the way my daughter has low porosity, 3b-3c curls.  She's a professional with great customer service and people skills. Thank you Porchia!
-----‐--------‐------------------------------------------------
My daughter has been going to Porchia for 2-3 years. She gives you so much info on how to care for your curls after your hair cut and etc.

originalText.text:
This is an overdue and well deserved feedback for Porchia. 5 stars and more to her amazing work on our curls! Prices are very affordable and a cute and cozy location with very easy access. Wouldn't trade her for another stilist ! She knows how to make art on any ethnicity's curl background.
Thanks Porchia !

text.text:

Thanks Porchia !

originalText.text: Ahhhh! Porchia! Porchia! PORCHIA!!!! Is AMAZING!!!! I’ve had a big chop a year ago and it’s been a year since I trimmed it  and she shaped my hair so beautifully!! And I left very happy! Porchia really takes care of you makes sure she gives you tips and shows you what’s she’s using! Ahh I was just in love with everything and being an Afro Latina it’s so amazing to have my hair done with an amazing woman who has a black owned business!
